text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Everyone doing all right? No sizing<n>issues or anything?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ah, um, just a minute, please! Can't...<n>tie the sash!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Whoa there, Urara! Stay still for just a<n>little longer! We're
almost done!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Haah ha ha ha! Gaze upon me, robed<n>in splendor! Such
beauty cannot be of<n>this realm—I am as a rose sent from<n>
heaven itself!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
My very person is a cause for<n>celebration, a herald of the
new year!<n>Witness! For I hereby declare the<n>founding of
the New Overlord Kingdom!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I'm all dressed up too! Oh hey,<n>mine's different from
Oppy's!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. Given the special occasion, I<n>thought I'd ask the
designer to tailor<n>the pieces to match each of you. ♪

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
That's our Tazuna! Always paying<n>attention to detail! Now,
how fare the<n>other two?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: And here I am! The size, the fit, it's<n>just perfect!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I can feel the fortune coming already!<n>Auspicious and
ostentatious! I think I<n>could take a 3,000-meter over turf<n>
with ease!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Umm, Director? It's so gorgeous, I<n>can't help but feel like
it's wasted on<n>me...

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Nonsense! When our students<n>challenge their limits, it is our
duty to<n>support them in any way we can!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Karuta may seem like an elegant<n>game, but in truth it is
fierce! Proper<n>dress requires the same material<n>used in
racewear!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
As you will be representing our<n>academy, we want you
competing at<n>full strength!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: D-Director... Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(I'm sure the old me would've felt<n>nothing but pressure
hearing those<n>words... but now...)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Basically, a taker needs acceleration,<n>fast reflexes, the
ability to make snap<n>judgments, and speed.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
So, um... since you excel in the final<n>leg of a race, I think you
would be best<n>for the role.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
That's it? When you suddenly<n>requested a change of
command, I<n>thought you were planning a<n>rebellious
takeover scene!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Wh-wh-what? I-I would never do that!<n>A-also, I was thinking
about you two,<n>and...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
In karuta, you also need someone to<n>"guard" and
"screen"—get in the<n>opponent's way, basically.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
You guard the card when it's on your<n>side, and when it's
on their side, you<n>set a screen so your teammate has a<n>
clear path to it.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
S-so I was thinking, Fukukitaru, you<n>could focus on the
opponent and tell<n>Urara how to move accordingly...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
That makes sense. My voice is<n>louder, and I bet Urara
would stick to<n>her mark like glue!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
And if that slows down our<n>opponents even a little, Opera O
can<n>make a run for it—and sh-she'd never<n>lose!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ah, erm, sorry, I know coming from<n>me it... i-it might sound
stupid, but...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
No, not at all! Who knew karuta had<n>so much strategic depth
to it—color me<n>surprised!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
You know, I'm starting to get excited!<n>Okay then, let's swap
roles and give it<n>a go!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Oh? What's the matter, Doto?<n>Something on your mind?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Oh, no! I-it's just, wearing these<n>robes suddenly makes the<n>
tournament feel so much more real...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Huh, I think you're right! Before a<n>race, it's once you put on
your<n>racewear that the nerves really start<n>to kick in!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Now all that's left for us to do is put<n>your strategy to the
test.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hey folks, really appreciate you<n>lending us a hand!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, don't mention it. You guys are<n>gonna compete in the
tournament,<n>right? That's so cool!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: We're all rooting for ya—you guys got<n>this!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Aw, well thank you. Okay, so, when<n>the poem starts, if you
could run over<n>to this side of the field...

text_block_list.name: Reciter App
text_block_list.text: Umamusume, eternal...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: O-O-Opera O! Our side, left, five-one!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Already there!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Urara, time to guard! Spread out your<n>arms and don't let
them past!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Got it! Just like this!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Aha! Mine for the taking!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Uhh... um, did we just...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
A truly ideal, truly elegant<n>performance! Perfect, I might even<n>
venture to call it!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey! My guard was perfect too,<n>wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
You know, I had my doubts at first,<n>but we absolutely
crushed it. I don't<n>think it gets any better than that!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
And it's all thanks to Doto studying<n>up on karuta for us.
Isn't that right,<n>"Commander" Doto?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Eeep! I-I didn't do that much! B-but, if<n>I helped even a little
bit, th-then I'm<n>glad!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: We worked super hard, so I know<n>we're gonna win!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
(She's not wrong... Practice is going<n>well, so maybe, just
maybe... I thought<n>it'd be totally out of our reach, but...)

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
W-well, there are no guarantees! But<n>win or lose, let's go
into it ready to<n>grab ourselves a bag of New Year's<n>
fortune!

text_block_list.name: The Three
text_block_list.text: Yeah!
